biotools.summary: Gene Disease Features Ontology-based Overview System (Gendoo) is a web tool for visualizing disease feature profiles generated from the assignment of MeSH vocabulary for associated drugs, biological phenomena and anatomy to OMIM data. This approach assists in interpreting -omic data for its molecular and clinical aspects.
